\/C:\/Users\/admin\/Desktop\/codepool\/_: The article shares how to access document scanners in Java using the REST APIs of Dynamsoft Service which communicates with scanners via protocols like TWAIN, WIA, eSCL, SANE and ICA.
本文介绍了如何使用Java通过Dynamsoft Service的REST API调用文档扫描仪，该API通过TWAIN、WIA、eSCL、SANE和ICA等协议与扫描仪进行通信。
The article shares how to access document scanners in Java using the REST APIs of Dynamsoft Service which communicates with scanners via protocols like TWAIN, WIA, eSCL, SANE and ICA.
A desktop app with JavaFX is built as a demo.
A desktop app with JavaFX is built as a demo.
<g1>Dynamic Web TWAIN</g1> is an SDK which enables document scanning from browsers.
<g1>Dynamic Web TWAIN</g1>是一个给Web应用添加文档扫描功能的SDK。
<g1>Dynamic Web TWAIN</g1> is an SDK which enables document scanning from browsers.
Under its hood, a backend service named Dynamsoft Service is running to communicate with scanners via protocols like TWAIN, WIA, eSCL, SANE and ICA.
它会在本地运行一个叫Dynamsoft Service的后端服务，通过TWAIN、WIA、eSCL、SANE和ICA等协议与扫描仪进行通信。
Under its hood, a backend service named Dynamsoft Service is running to communicate with scanners via protocols like TWAIN, WIA, eSCL, SANE and ICA.
The service runs on Windows, macOS and Linux.
该服务是跨平台的，可以在Windows、macOS和Linux上运行。
The service runs on Windows, macOS and Linux.
Starting from Dynamic Web TWAIN v18.4, Dynamsoft Service will be accessible via REST APIs so that we can use different programming languages to create document scanning applications.
从Dynamic Web TWAIN v18.4开始，可以通过REST API访问Dynamsoft Service，以便我们可以用不同的编程语言创建文档扫描应用程序。
Starting from Dynamic Web TWAIN v18.4, Dynamsoft Service will be accessible via REST APIs so that we can use different programming languages to create document scanning applications.
In this article, we are going to talk about how to access document scanners using the REST APIs in Java.
在本文中，我们将讨论如何使用Java通过这一REST API调用文档扫描仪。
In this article, we are going to talk about how to access document scanners using the REST APIs in Java.
A desktop app is built using JavaFX.
使用JavaFX构建了一个桌面应用程序。
A desktop app is built using JavaFX.
Some advantages of using the REST APIs of Dynamsoft Service for document scanning in Java:
使用Dynamsoft Service的REST API在Java中进行文档扫描的一些优点：
Some advantages of using the REST APIs of Dynamsoft Service for document scanning in Java:
It is cross-platform supporting multiple scanning protocols.
它是跨平台的，支持多种扫描协议。
It is cross-platform supporting multiple scanning protocols.
If we directly call TWAIN API, we have to use JRE 32-bit as most drivers are 32-bit.
如果我们直接调用TWAIN API ，我们需要使用32位的JRE，因为大多数驱动程序都是32位。
If we directly call TWAIN API, we have to use JRE 32-bit as most drivers are 32-bit.
Using the REST APIs does not have this problem.
使用REST API就没有此问题。
Using the REST APIs does not have this problem.
A license for Dynamic Web TWAIN is needed.
需要申请一个Dynamic Web TWAIN的许可证来使用它。
A license for Dynamic Web TWAIN is needed.
You can apply for a license <g1>here</g1>.
You can apply for a license <g1>here</g1>.

需要在设备上安装Dynamsoft Service。
